title: How to Make No Frills French Toast Waffles

steps.headline: Add the egg, milk, butter and salt to a bowl.
Dip sliced bread into egg mixture.
Cook until golden in waffle iron.

text: Add the egg, milk, butter and salt to a bowl. Whisk to combine. Dip sliced bread into egg mixture.  Cook until golden in waffle iron.  Finished.
